article.author: Celebrity Cruises
article.title: The Retreat. All Suites. All Exclusive. All Included.
article.lead: So Much More Than a Suite
article.body: The Retreat includes stunning accommodations, a private restaurant, and an exclusive lounge and sundeck that rival any high-end resort.
